name: GetBoardDocumentItem
description:
Retrieve information for a specific document item on a board.

Use this tool to obtain details about a particular document item located on a board in Miro. Requires 'boards:read' scope access.

parameters.name: board_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board from which to retrieve a specific item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a specific item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item you want to retrieve from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve.
